divs: Sighting DetailsWitness Statement from Report Form#1 "About 9:30 pm on 12-11-2007 I was at home alone (1330 Groesbeck St, Stephenville, TX 76401). My wife and kids were gone to my parents house and I was home alone. I took my dog outside to let him use the bathroom. It was a clear cold night with lots of stars and no leaves on the trees. My dog was taking his time "going" when all of [the] sudden he stopped and looked up with his ears perked up like he heard something. I didn't. I looked up and across the street to see what had caught his attention. Transcript of audio recording (See attachment #1 "
